TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NullExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现 XAML 标记扩展以返回 null 对象，你可使用此对象在 XAML 中将值显式设置为 null。

span.span: Implements a XAML markup extension in order to return a null object, which you can use to explicitly set values to null in XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XAML 中，null 和空字符串是通常不等效的。In XAML, null and empty string are generally not equivalent. 你使用`{x:Null}`扩展用法，以便设置基础属性设置为特性`null`。You use the `{x:Null}` extension usage in order to set an attribute that sets the underlying property to `null`. 有关如何设置 null 值是与 XAML 中的方案的详细信息，请参阅[X:null 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)。For more information on how setting null values is relevant for scenarios in XAML, see [x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md). 此类是标记扩展实现。This class is a markup extension implementation. 标记扩展类存在主要是为了提供基础结构支持 XAML 处理器如何解释的特定扩展。Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for how XAML processors interpret a particular extension. 标记扩展实现类公开的成员通常不应从代码中调用。The members that markup extension implementation classes expose are not typically intended to be called from your code. 此标记扩展类支持[X:null 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md).NET XAML 服务的使用情况。This markup extension class supports the [x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md) usage for .NET XAML Services. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类 (与`x:Null`标记扩展的 XAML 行为支持，以及相关 xmlns 映射) 存在于特定于 WPF 程序集中 PresentationFramework。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class (and the `x:Null` markup extension XAML behavior support as well as the relevant xmlns mapping) existed in the WPF-specific assembly PresentationFramework. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 这使得`x:Null`用法可供使用引用.NET XAML 服务的框架的应用程序。This makes the `x:Null` usage available to applications using frameworks that reference .NET XAML Services. 处理程序，但前提是你将不作为引用的程序集需要 PresentationFramework [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。You do not need PresentationFramework as a referenced assembly so long as you are targeting [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). System.Xaml 程序集使用映射到 XAML 语言 XAML 命名空间的程序集中的所有类型 ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)])。The System.Xaml assembly uses to map all types in the assembly to the XAML namespace for the XAML language ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)]). 通常声明的前缀[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)]中根元素映射并使用前缀`x`。Typically you declare a prefix for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)] in a root element mapping and use the prefix `x`. ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes WPF 依赖项属性，当依赖项属性值设置为`null`，你将不一定属性设置为其默认值，即使它是引用属性。For WPF dependency properties, when you set a dependency property value to `null`, you are not necessarily setting the property to its default value, even if it is a reference property. 依赖项属性的默认值取决于其注册依赖属性。The default value of a dependency property depends on its dependency property registration. 未设置的值不一定`null`; 请参阅。An unset value is not necessarily `null` either; see . 有关详细信息，请参阅或[依赖项属性概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)。For more information, see or [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可为标记扩展实现提供服务的对象。

span.span: An object that can provide services for the markup extension implementation.

summary.span: 提供要用作值的 作为此标记扩展的输出。

span.span: Provides to use as a value as the output of this markup extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 XAML 处理器实现，不应直接调用。This method supports XAML processor implementations, and is not intended to be called directly. XAML 处理器实现使用此方法，创建包括的对象图时`x:Null`扩展用法。A XAML processor implementation uses this method when it creates object graphs that include an `x:Null` extension usage. 这依赖于常规行为 XAML 处理器在处理任何并调用其`ProvideValue`实现。This relies on general behavior for XAML processors when they process any and call its `ProvideValue` implementation. 此实现不依赖于服务基于已传递的`serviceProvider`。This implementation does not rely on services that are based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 它始终返回 null 引用而不考虑上下文。It always returns a null reference regardless of context. 在.NET Framework XAML 服务实现中，要返回的值获取通过引用静态值。In the .NET Framework XAML Services implementation, the value to return is obtained by referencing the static value.
